attributes.action: lowering the age of cervical cancer screenings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beleive that the age of cervical cancer should be lowered in the uk from the age of 25 to 18 if not 16. I beleive that the age is much to high and that women under the age of 25 are also contracting cervical cancer and are not having a fair advantage to discover the disease quickly enough.

rejection.details: There are already a number of petitions that you might want to sign: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/smearsfor16yrs/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/lowersmeartests/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Smears-at-20yrs/http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/HPVvacination/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
